name: manusam.txt
title: Manu bats-sampled (Patterson et al, subm.)
content: This matrix is from Patterson, Pacheco, & Solari (submitted), and describes the distribution of 82 species of bat among 19 elevational levels in the valley; the matrix is arranged from foot (300-400 m) to head (3400-3500 m). Distributional ranges have been inferred (i.e., species present at 300 and 500 m elevations are assumed to occur at 400 m), based on our netted samples.  This is a "holier" set of distributions than pre- sented by the literature records (please see the matrix <manuinf.txt>).
